abstract: The three-bedroom apartment at 15 Central Park West had sold for just $6.8 million three years ago.
snippet: The three-bedroom apartment at 15 Central Park West had sold for just $6.8 million three years ago.
lead_paragraph: The three-bedroom condominium at 15 Central Park West that sold for $17 million - after last trading hands in 2008 for $6.8 million and thus generating nearly $10 million profit in just three years - was the highest sale of the week, according to city property records.
